page.title: 19Houses in Sparkhill B'ham
page.content: There are lots of houses in Sparhill. Most of them are terraced houses. Some houses are smaller, others are big. Some have 4 bedrooms, others have 3. Some of the houses have their lounges at the front, some have 2 lounges. Some houses have toilets downstairs but most have toilets upstairs. Some houses have gas fires others have central heating. Some houses have a back garden others have back yards. Some houses have a front porch. Some houses have water tanks and immersion heaters. Some houses are on the main road others are in side streets. Some houses are used for business but most are used for home living. Most of the houses in the area were built in the middle of the nineteenth century.
